/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades adorned with a variety of signs and advertisements, reflecting the commercial vibrancy of the area. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
